tweet: Too many can't afford the medicine they need to live. Last month, the House passed bold legislation that will #LowerDrugCosts for all Americans. I join fellow North Texan @RepVeasey in urging the Senate to act and bring real relief to the American people. https://www.dallasweekly.com/articles/commentary-the-senate-must-act-and-join-the-house-in-lowe%C2%ADing-perscription-drug-prices-for-all-americans/ …

Hey N. Texas students: @dartmedia is accepting submissions for their student art contest. If you want to see your art on a DART vehicle or in an art exhibit, share your artistic talents by submitting a piece by Feb. 28. Visit their website to learn more:  https://www.dart.org/transiteducation/posters2020.asp …

Mr. Repp’s story is one of incredible perseverance during one of the darkest times in history. North Texas is grateful for his service to our country and his work w/ @dhhrm_org. He'll be remembered as someone who represented the best of our community. https://www.dallasnews.com/news/commentary/2020/01/15/dallas-has-lost-a-vital-human-story-of-the-holocaust-with-the-death-of-south-dallas-shopkeeper-jack-repp/ …

Trade with Mexico and Canada is vital to our North Texas economy and supports thousands of jobs right here in our community. One of the best ways to stay up to date on my work in Congress for #TX32 is to subscribe to my newsletter. Today, my office is hosting mobile office hours in Wylie. Last year, I traveled to Afghanistan to visit our troops. There, I met a young captain training the Afghanistan military and working to degrade Taliban and ISIS elements. With every decision we make, Congress must ensure that we are serving him, as well as he serves our nation. pic.twitter.com/FsxPMPcEfX

Discrimination against older workers has no place in our North Texas community. Age discrimination should be treated as seriously as any type of discrimination, which is why I voted to pass a bipartisan proposal to restore strong workplace protections for older workers. #POWADA pic.twitter.com/cee1CxBKAN

As a member of the Transportation Committee, I know the importance of engaging with local officials & experts to ensure our transportation system is working for Texans. I was glad to meet w/ @TXDOT's Dallas District Engineer Mo Bur this week to discuss priorities in North Texas. pic.twitter.com/DCTbCl62Ki

When America strays from our values on the global stage, it makes the world less safe. In this moment of peril for our nation, it is crucial that Congress reclaim our Constitutional role. The House took a step forward this week by voting to require Congressional approval before any further action against Iran.

Read my @dallasnews op-ed: https://www.dallasnews.com/opinion/commentary/2020/01/11/rep-allred-to-de-escalate-the-situation-with-iran-congress-must-assert-itself-on-foreign-policy/ …

Trade with Mexico and Canada is paramount to our economic success in North Texas. That’s why I fought for the USMCA’s passage in the House and I’m glad to see it making progress in the Senate. I look forward to it supporting good jobs in our region. https://www.cnbc.com/2020/01/07/senate-finance-committee-passes-trump-usmca-trade-deal.html …

America can be a force for good. When we lead with our values, it makes us safer. But for too long Congress abdicated its war powers authority, which is why tonight I voted to reassert that authority and require Congressional approval for any further military action against Iran.

I admire the resilience of Mr. Amiri after enduring this tragedy, and I was glad to help him and his family reunite for what I am sure has been a very trying time. This spring, I'm holding a ceremony to honor veterans of the Vietnam War and their families as part of the U.S. Vietnam War Commemoration. If you are a Vietnam vet, a family member of one, or a survivor of one living in #TX32, submit a nomination at  https://allred.house.gov/services/veteran-services ….

If your home or business was affected by the October 20 storms, there is still time to get assistance by applying for a loan from @SBAgov. Please visit  https://disasterloan.sba.gov/ela  to apply or call my office at 972-972-7949 for more info. The deadline is Jan. 13th!
